name: InvocationResponse
desc: Properties to include in responses from all intent endpoints.

items.name: result
items.desc: The outcome of handling the intent.

items.name: method
items.desc: The action your service takes to process this intent.

items.name: metrics
items.desc: Performance details about processing the request.

items.name: debug
items.desc: A URI for additional data about this request. Only include this property in debugging or staging environments, not in production.
